name: Pirate's Keel
description:
Yarr! You're a pirate, stranded on a deep sea. Your goal is to destroy other pirates. Simple enough. Grab the ammo and shoot those bastards!

Game is in early prototype stage. I've planned on adding many things, only time will tell if it is possible.  Main future features will be listed here:  https://trello.com/b/ttnlSx1x with key notes such as local and online multiplayer.

Please bear in mind that Xbox compatible controller is required to play! I will add support for keybaord and mouse ASAP as it is priority to get better and unified input system in version 0.2.

Big part of Pirate's Keel is also open-source, you can check out my repo here - https://github.com/konradp/PiratesPublic so feel free to lurk around.

Controls are listed in help section of the game, but here are additional keys for debugging purposes: 
- M key - mutes/unmutes music
- H key - hides GUI
- F key - activates/deactivates Free cam mode. In this mode you can pan your camera using right mouse button . Move using WSAD, and using QE to control altitude. Also Ctrl modifies the speed of free cam.

System Requirements:
Intel i3 3rd gen or equivalent
4GB of Ram
1GB of VRam on GPU
Appx 1.5GB of space
Xbox compatible controller, at least for now

See you on the open sea!
